channel.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
channel.description:
Came across this at the GameBanana website which looks interesting.
[url='https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/scripts/7686']https://gamebanana.com/blackmesa/scripts/7686[/url]
Within his description, way at the bottom of the page below his script, the modder provides links to a couple of YouTube videos demonstrating what his new script does.

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
^^^

OldDirtyBastard:

Not if it gibs into the same dismembered torso every goddamn time.

Exactly. That’s my point. How come the system has barely been touched when it’s all out there?

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
nobody cares about the generic lo-poly hl1 gibs retextured with a photo of genoa salami with a red filter on it?
why hasnt anyone bothered with all those great gibs from the community project

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
This mod basically gives the gibbing system more variety in how an npc gibs.

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
I mean, it’s one of the most fun things to do in any game that features them.

Not if it gibs into the same dismembered torso every goddamn time.

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
this is a pretty underwhelming script, but it does beg the question as to why no one has really been touching the gibbing system…

I mean, it’s one of the most fun things to do in any game that features them. It’s supposed to be the ultimate gift of fucking someone up to the core. I’d definitely be all over it if I knew anything about it :s

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: Han_Shot_First
item.description:
Could someone show me a video using this script? I would like to see the effects before I implement it myself.

Edit: So I watched the videos below… So essentially they just blow up when the are gibbed. That’s… Less substantial than I anticipated.

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: _amp_gt_origami_amp
item.description:
Try setting off an explosive pack near some dead HECU using this script.
The amount of raspberry jelly that goes flying everywhere is hilarious.

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
L4D style dismembering would be awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: New NPC's Gibbing Script
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
I know what it says in the description, I’m not stupid. I don’t know what he means with dismembering the security zombie (L4D style? Just gibbing? What’s different from default gibbing?), and “editing gibbing” can be anything.

Read full topic

herp derp another customizer

very substantial

item.description:
I just edited gib_manifest.txt, I fixed zombie security, now you can dismember them, and edited gibing for other monsters, look at this video’s:

That’s what he said in the file description.
